name: Fallen Sorcerer
flavor: Warped mage bound by the bargains they made in life.

features.name: Conflagration - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to unleash an all-consuming firestorm and make an attack against all targets within Close range. Targets the Sorcerer succeeds against take 2d10+6 direct magic damage.

features.name: Nightmare Tableau - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to trap a target within Far range in a powerful illusion of their worst fears. While trapped, the target is Restrained and Vulnerable until they break free, ending both conditions, with a successful Instinct Roll.

features.name: Slippery - Reaction
features.desc: When the Sorcerer takes damage from an attack, they can teleport up to Far range.

features.name: Shackles of Guilt - Reaction
features.desc: Countdown (Loop 2d6). When the Sorcerer is in the spotlight for the first time, activate the countdown. When it triggers, all targets within Far range become Vulnerable and must mark a Stress as they relive their greatest regrets. A target can break free from their regret with a successful Presence or Strength Roll. When a PC fails to break free, they lose a Hope.
